entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
